Name: Cold Water Piping (dia > 2.5 inches), SDC A or B, PIPING FRAGILITY

GeneralInformation.Description: Potable water.  Costing based upon 1000 ft segments of large diameter welded steel pipes assumed, smaller dia pipes are deemed rugged
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Minor leakage at flange connections  -  1 leak per 1000  feet of pipe
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Retighten flange bolts at leaking joints.

DamageStates.Description: Pipe Break - 1 break per 1000 feet of pipe
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace 20 foot sections of pipe where breaks occur.
